lines.lyrics: He won[D/F#] the lottery[G] and [D/F#]died the next [Em]day
It's the good ad[D]vice[G] that you [D]just didn't [Em]take
Mr. [D/F#]Play It Safe[G] was [D/F#]afraid to fly[Em]
He packed his [D/F#]suit-[G]case and kissed his [D/F#]kids goodbye[Em]
He waited his [D/F#]whole damn [G]life to [D/F#]take that [Em]flight
And as the [D/F#]plane crashed [G]down he thought
It's the good ad[D]vice[G] that you [D]just didn't [Em]take
Well, [Cmaj7]life has a funny way of sneaking up [Gmaj7/D]on you when you think everything's okay
And [Cmaj7]life has a funny way of helping you [Gmaj7/D]out when you think everything's gone wrong
and [Cmaj7]everything blows up in your fa[Cadd9]ce
It's like [D/F#]ten thousand [G]spoons when all you [D/F#]need is a [Em]knife
A little too [D/F#]ironic [G]... and yeah, I [D/F#]really do think[Em] ...
It's the good ad[D]vice[G] that you [D]just didn't [Em]take
And yeah, [Cmaj7]life has a funny way of sneaking up on [Gmaj7/D]you
